option.name: content
option.value: Respond in plaintext. Avoid overly verbose descriptions or unnecessary details. Respond in conventional commit style

group.name: Refactor 'login' action to use LoginData and return LoginFormState
group.description: Refactor the login action to use a structured LoginData object and return a consistent LoginFormState for better error handling.

file.summary: Refactors the `login` function to accept `LoginData` and return `LoginFormState`, improving type safety and error handling. Also adds a redirect to '/' after `logout`.
Updates the `LoginFormState` type to include `error` and `success` properties, aligning with the refactored `login` action's return type.
Adds a redirect to '/admin' after `createSession` to ensure users are directed to the admin dashboard upon successful login.
Adds 'use server' directive to `dal.ts` and `verifySession` to explicitly mark them as server-side functions.

group.name: Implement 'StatusPopup' and 'useStatus' hook for UI feedback
group.description: Introduce a reusable StatusPopup component and a useStatus hook to provide consistent UI feedback across forms.

file.summary: Adds the `StatusPopup` component and `useStatus` hook for displaying transient status messages with automatic hiding and styling based on `StylingContext`.
Replaces manual status state and display with the new `useStatus` hook and `StatusPopup` component in `ArtistForm`.
Integrates the `useStatus` hook and `StatusPopup` component into `ReleaseForm` for consistent status message display.

group.name: Update 'LoginForm' to use FormField and StatusPopup
group.description: Modernize the LoginForm by integrating FormField, StatusPopup, and headlessui components for improved UX.

file.summary: Rewrites `LoginForm` to use `FormField`, `StatusPopup`, and `@headlessui/react` for popover functionality, enhancing UI and state management.
Adds a `type` prop to `FormField` with a default of 'text', allowing for different input types like 'password'.
Removes the direct rendering of `LoginForm` and adds a redirect to '/' if the user is not authenticated, streamlining the admin page access.
Introduces a new `LoginButton` component that uses `@headlessui/react`'s `Popover` to trigger the `LoginForm`.
Replaces the direct 'Log In' button with the new `LoginButton` component, integrating the popover login functionality.

group.name: Add 'HeaderDropdown' for admin navigation
group.description: Introduce a HeaderDropdown component to consolidate admin navigation options like logout and password change.

file.summary: Adds the `HeaderDropdown` component using `@headlessui/react` to provide a menu for admin actions like logout.
Replaces the direct `logout` link with the new `HeaderDropdown` component in the admin header.
Sets a default empty function for the `onClick` prop in `HeaderLink` to prevent potential undefined errors when used with components like `MenuButton`.

group.name: Update 'getRecentReleases' to limit results
group.description: Modify `getRecentReleases` to fetch a limited number of recent releases for performance and display.

file.summary: Modifies `getRecentReleases` to fetch a maximum of 9 releases and refines `getRelease`'s `notFound()` logic.
Adjusts the display of recent releases to use a grid layout and adds basic styling for release titles and artist names.

group.name: Enhance 'ReleaseArtwork' and 'ReleaseGrid' components
group.description: Improve the ReleaseArtwork component by conditionally rendering vinyl and update ReleaseGrid to pass `small` prop.

file.summary: Modifies `ReleaseArtwork` to conditionally render the vinyl image only when the `small` prop is false, improving display for smaller artwork.
Adds `small={false}` prop to `ReleaseArtwork` in `ReleaseGrid` to ensure the vinyl image is rendered for full-size release displays.

group.name: Enhance 'ReleaseLinks' and 'Releases' scrollbar styling
group.description: Apply custom scrollbar styling to ReleaseLinks and Releases components for better visual integration.

file.summary: Adds custom scrollbar styling to the `ReleaseLinks` component using `scrollbarColor` and `scrollbarGutter`.
Applies custom scrollbar styling to the main container and `ul` elements within the `Releases` component for theme consistency.

group.name: Update 'FormLinks' to use optional chaining for array access
group.description: Update `FormLinks` to use optional chaining for array access, preventing potential runtime errors.

file.summary: Modifies `FormLinks` to use optional chaining (`!`) when updating link properties, ensuring safer array access.

group.name: Update TypeScript configuration and dependencies
group.description: Update TypeScript configuration for stricter checks and add 'react-multi-carousel' dependency.

file.summary: Adds stricter TypeScript compilation options to `tsconfig.json` for improved code quality.
Adds `react-multi-carousel` as a new dependency to `package.json`.
Updates `pnpm-lock.yaml` to include the new `react-multi-carousel` dependency and its transitive dependencies.
Updates the generated OpenAPI schema definition file `schema.d.ts` to reflect API changes, specifically making `background`, `foreground`, and `accent` non-nullable in `Colours`.
Removes an unused `React` import from `ColourPicker.tsx`.
Updates `.idea/workspace.xml` to reflect changes in project tasks, branch cleanup history, and embedding indexing information.

list.name: Changes
list.comment: feat(releases): add /releases/recent endpoint and frontend integration

list.name: Add 'HeaderDropdown' for admin navigation
list.comment: Introduce a HeaderDropdown component to consolidate admin navigation options like logout and password change.

list.name: Enhance 'ReleaseLinks' and 'Releases' scrollbar styling

list.name: Implement 'StatusPopup' and 'useStatus' hook for UI feedback
list.comment: Introduce a reusable StatusPopup component and a useStatus hook to provide consistent UI feedback across forms.

list.name: Refactor 'login' action to use LoginData and return LoginFormState
list.comment: Refactor the login action to use a structured LoginData object and return a consistent LoginFormState for better error handling.

list.name: Update 'FormLinks' to use optional chaining for array access
list.comment: Update `FormLinks` to use optional chaining for array access, preventing potential runtime errors.

list.name: Update 'getRecentReleases' to limit results

list.name: Update 'LoginForm' to use FormField and StatusPopup

list.comment: Update TypeScript configuration for stricter checks and add 'react-multi-carousel' dependency.

implement createRelease and add support for creating new releases across the app

Add Artist management support in Admin Dashboard
- Introduce Artist form with edit/save functionality. - Add navigation links for Admin pages in header. - Implement `updateArtist` action for server-side artist updates. - Refactor and enhance Dashboard and related components.
